storyInfo: Noir Corne rescues the female researcher stuck in the depths of the mine, and learns that now is the best time to deal with the Rathalos. After treating her injury, Yato must decide between saving the old hunter or hunting the Rathalos, and makes her decision.

attributes.content: Hyah—!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Mrrowagh!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Noir Corne! Mew almost cut me in half!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Ah, sorry. I still haven't gotten the hang of this Long Sword yet.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: These fellows look even scarier than the ones we saw in the cave befur.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Judging from the Originium crystal distribution on their bodies, the infection seems to be quite severe, and they're moving so quickly, as if trying to flee.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Mew must be quite curious about how I gnaw so much. It's because I've been observing the endemic lifeforms affected by originium the whole time—
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Hey, are mew even listening?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Saving people is more important than that! We need to go take a look!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Hello? It's safe now, where are you?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Here! Over here!
Huh... over here?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Yes, behind this sliding door.
...There's nothing blocking the door though?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Huh? How is that possible? I've tried everything I could to open it, to no avail.
Uh, how about lifting this handle down here?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Hmm? Like this...? Ah! It opened!
So that's how it works? No wonder I had so much difficulty finding it. Haha, what an ingenious design!
So... were you trapped like that for the last three days?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: That's right, heheh... Maybe I was a bit too obsessed with my research. After all, it's such a rare finding...
Oh? What's this soft thing under my feet?
Uh... the corpse of an Originium slug. May I ask who you are?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Sorry there, sluggy...
Ah, I forgot to introduce myself. I'm Mirai Takii, an ecological researcher.
Noir Corne, the horns on her head are diffurent than yours!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: You said your name was... Mirai?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: We're operators from Rhodes Island, on a mission in the area. I'm Noir Corne, and this is—
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Mrrow! So you're a scholar of the environment here?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Of course! I'm in the middle of an ecological survey, actually.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: May I take a look at your research notes, purrty please?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Wha— Ah! What is this adorable talking creature?! What's it going to do?
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Mrow! I'm not some creature, I'm a Felyne, and a researcher myself to boot! Look, I have meow own research notes here.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Wow, you even sketched the little explosion that Fukurami herbs make? That's one of my favorites. Did you know that it explodes from the pressure of the liquid inside the fruit?
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: That was my hypawthesis! As the fruit ripens, the mucus inside gradually builds up—
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Hey, uh, I'm the one who saved you, so mind answering my questions first?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Oh fine.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: ...So how did you get stuck down here in the first place?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: It was part of my ecological survey, I did say that I'm a researcher, didn't I?
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Okay, next question—
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Hold on! Let me talk first! I've got some incredible news for you all! You'll never guess what I saw!
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Do you know what's living in this cave?
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: A—super—big—FLYING MONSTER!
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: ...Yeah.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Flying! Monster! Breathes Fire!
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: ...Gotcha.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: 'G-Gotcha'? Do you not find it the least bit interesting?
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: It's called a Rathalos, and we were on its back before getting thrown down here.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Ah... How could this be...?
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: What a tragedy... it turned out to be a creature that's already known. I was even going to name it after a character from a manga I read recently...I got so excited over nothing...
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Wait! Talking creature, I've never seen anything like you before! Are you... a new species?
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: W-What are mew doing! Get your paws off me!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Just let me take a good look!
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Hold on, let's get down to business first. Did you come into contact with the Rathalos?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Yes, I observed it for a good while. I recorded its actions in the mine and what changes it went through within the Originium zone, but now it feels like that was all a waste of time.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Mew recorded its behavior?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Originium zone? Changes?!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Give— No... could you please show us those records? This is really important!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Of course, just wait here for a bit while I find them.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Mrow? Food, drinking water, even light equipment... What's all this?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Protective gear for the Originium, of course.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: ...How well-purrpared. No wonder mew managed to last three days down here.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: I even brought some carbonated Suzuka-flavored drinks.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Noir Corne, there's a ladder here, maybe we can escape through the hole we came from.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: This looks like the entrance to the Originium processing plant, where did you see the Rathalos?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Not too far from here, just straight ahead through this hole in the mine shaft.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: The shaft you came down was the one closest to the mine, and was only abandoned because it was too far from the village. I imagine it's the most convenient for the Rathalos to fly in and out from.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: You seem awfully familiar with the place.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Enough to get by.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Oh right, here.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: And this is?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: The Rathalos brought you two here, right? So I'm guessing you were separated from your other companions.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: You can make use of the vent over there to send a smoke signal, to help them to find you.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Thank you very much.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Anyway, here are all my notes, but my handwriting might be a little messy, so I'll read them out loud for you while you have a look.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Four days ago, the Rathalos flew into the cave at night, and the miners changing shifts were scared away.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: The flames it spewed also triggered a small explosion which led to a partial collapse of the mine, and thus sealed the passage to the village.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: No wonder there was so much active Originium dust...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Mm, it doesn't seem to be doing so well itself. The huge amount of Originium dust has noticeably affected it. In particular it has difficulty feeding and an increasingly violent temperament.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: I used an instrument to examine the dust in more detail, and could see a large amount of particles suspended around it. Every time it breathes fire, the dust is set aflame, causing great devastation... We're lucky it hasn't wrecked the mine yet.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Noir Corne! That's why its flames are so pawerful!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Ah, did you come across it while outside?
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: More than once, even... It's why we came in the first place, actually. It's been spreading Originium dust all over the village.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: In that case, I must stress that if you want to deal with it, now might be the best time.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Because it's in an extremely weakened state, and though it can recover quickly, it will still take some time. Also, the mine has been overused to the point of becoming structurally unstable.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: So if you just detonated bombs in certain spots, you could instantly collapse the entire mine.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: I'm a little worried about the Rathalos spewing fire while we're doing that, though. It'd ignite all the Originium dust and... Well, the consequences would be disastrous.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Yes, but you have to trust me. As long as you follow my plan, it won't have a chance to open its jaws, let alone spit out an ember.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: The only problem is that we don't have enough people to set up bombs in all the locations I marked on the map. We'd need at least one more, or it'll be virtually impossible to get it done by today.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: It would be purrfect if Yato were here then.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Is that another of your companions?
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Yes, a very serious, but reliable lass. She also has two other Felynes like me by her side.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Then we should have enough, but...
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: But what?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: It's about the Rathalos. I still have some questions that might influence your final decision.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Check my notes on page 237, in the bottom right corner.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: I've done some research into the materials it leaves behind, and found out that it's not actually infected with Oripathy. Which means its changes were not due to the infection.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: They're not? Then why does it have so meowch trouble feeding...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: I doubt it's completely unaffected by Originium, but I still wouldn't say it has Oripathy... What's even stranger is that more and more Originium clusters are forming on its body.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Uh, so... if the Rathalos isn't infected, the Originium clusters on its body might just be a temporary thing? And maybe it's not the one spreading the Originium dust?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: That's my theory, but I don't have any hard evidence to confirm it. Besides...
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: The Rathalos's behavior towards Originium is also remarkably different from other creatures I've observed, and... it's really difficult to describe.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: I think it's best if you just see it for yourselves.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Let's go, Noir Corne! Odd-horned Scholar, can mew show us the way?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: No, wait...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Oh, right, mew just escaped.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: I don't mind.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: No, that's not what I—
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: The communicator—We got a signal.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Oh, maybe it's due to the signal booster here.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Can mew try and contact Yato? Hurry and tell her what's going on here!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Not yet.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: First, I have to ask you something important, Ms. Takii.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Huh? Me?
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: You came into the mine alone but with ample resources, before the Rathalos even arrived.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: You're very familiar with the place, but weren't with the miners when they changed shifts, otherwise you wouldn't have gotten stuck here.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: From my experience with the villagers and how sus they've been about the mine, I doubt they'd let an outsider conduct an ecological survey here.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: In short, I have some doubts about your identity.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Not to mention your family name... it's the same as the headman of Roka Village, right?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: So you're related to him, but you don't mind teaching us how to destroy the mine, and are happy to guide us to the Rathalos.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Mirai Takii, what exactly is your angle here?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Oh dear. I wasn't trying to hide anything, but I suppose it was just a matter of time.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Were mew playing a trick on us? I see, so you weren't a scholar after all! Then... who exactly are you?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: No, I really am an ecological researcher, got all my papers and everything.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: I did omit a few details, like the fact that Ataru is my uncle, or that I actually snuck into the mine.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: I also knew that you were from Rhodes Island, because I'm the one who left your contact information for my uncle to find. I'm assuming he couldn't handle the Originium dust the Rathalos was spreading, so he called you guys in.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: You left him our contact info? Why?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Because I wanted to shut down the mine, and there was no way I could convince the entire village by myself.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Originally, I was planning to contact you myself.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: I figured that once you saw what was going on here, you'd do whatever it took to get the villagers away from here, right? Unfortunately, they confiscated my external communication equipment before I could.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: So I thought I'd come down here on my own, and figure out how to destroy it myself.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: What made you so sure we'd evacuate the village? It wasn't even guaranteed that we'd stop them from mining... Also, I still don't know why you want to destroy the mine.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Because if Roka Village continues to dig any deeper, this place will probably suffer a... a Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: A Catastrophe?! How soon are we talking?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Hard to say right now, since at this point it's just an anomaly in the surrounding environment.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: So the 'Mirai' we saw earlier was you leaving your mark after your investigation...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Yup. Then I assume you've been in a situation where it felt like you were just going in circles for hours. That's an effect of the anomaly.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: The bad news is that said anomaly is getting even worse.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: And I'm pretty sure our big boy Rathalos is heading the same way, though I haven't seen it do its flamethrower thing in its lair yet.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Of course, everything would be solved if you just went along with my plan.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: But why would the mine here cause a Catastrophe?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Because... Well, you'll understand once you see it.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Yato! Mew are bleeding!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Probably from when the Rathalos's tailspin that sent me hurtling to the ground. Some debris got into the wound, so I didn't notice it until now.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: It entered from the inner thigh... Can't tell how deep it is until I pull the debris out.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Do you have any medicine to help treat this?
attributes.name: Yato
Felyne Artisan
attributes.content: Mrow...

attributes.name: Felyne Artisan
attributes.content: Not this, or this..
It's alright, Artisan. Is there anything that can be used as a rope?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yes! Just wrap some grass together, like a braid!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: How strong is it... that should hold.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: And do you have anything that can burn?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Found something! It burns.
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Alright, then please make a fire... And this is for you.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: After the fire gets going, wipe this dagger clean, and put it over the flames, can you do that?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yes, but mew...
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: *Huff*...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Captain's log number four, this is Rhodes Island Operations Team A4... Captain Yato.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: In the previous battle with the Rathalos, I was separated from Operator Noir Corne, but our primary objective to track the creature has not changed. However... due to my current injury, the operation has been temporarily suspended.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: During this mission, we encountered many difficulties that far exceeded our expectations, and progress has not at all been smooth sailing.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: ...But I still believe in our ability to complete the mission, whatever the cost.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I am now preparing to begin emergency field surgery on my wound, and will make an audio recording of the process for review purposes after the mission...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: (Breathes deeply)
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: First, I will remove the shard of debris from the wound.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Ngh—Argh!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Blood! So meowch blood!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: *Pant* *pant*...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Next... using a rope to stop the bleeding...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Argh—
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: *pant**pant*...The wound... I can see the bone, but at least none of my arteries were hit...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: ...Needs disinfection... scraping away the dirt...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Ah—*hiss*
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Disinfection... complete. Next... to ensure the rest of the operation proceeds smoothly, I must make sure I remain mobile.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: In the absence of medicine and bandages... I have decided to use...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Artisan, is it ready?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: It's ready.
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Now cauterizing... the wound. End audio log.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Hand me the knife.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: (Breathes deeply)
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: (Presses the knife to the edge of the wound)
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Ahh—*hiss*——Augh!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Hgh!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yato! Are mew alright?
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: ...I'm... I'm fine.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The wound... Alright, the bleeding's stopped.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Over there! Look!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: A smoke signal... from Noir Corne? It's in the direction that the Palico pointed out, so they must have come across the Rathalos. I'm glad they're doing well at least.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The sky... It should be almost dawn by now, but it's still so dim? Black clouds...? Hm?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: What's that noise?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Forest! Rumbling and shaking!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: That sound! It's a beast!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Over there!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: The beasts are dashing out from the forest!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: There are so many of them... Have they noticed something?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Help! Help us!
Someone's calling for help! Let's go!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Kuso! Why are there so many of them?!
attributes.name: Impatient Villager

attributes.content: I told you not to listen to the headman's orders to enter the forest! It's just a few outsiders... Help!
attributes.name: Timid Villager

attributes.content: Stop yelling! Why would there be anyone else in this damn forest? We better think of something before we die here!
attributes.name: Impatient Villager

attributes.content: Villagers? What are they doing here?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: See! The yelling worked!
attributes.name: Timid Villager

attributes.content: Come with me, quickly. I'll lead you out of here.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Can we head over there? I think we can avoid the beasts' rampage that way.
attributes.name: Impatient Villager

attributes.content: We can try.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: We're here. Seems like the beasts aren't headed in this direction for now.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Huh? You're...
attributes.name: Timid Villager

attributes.content: It's them! The outsiders the headman wanted us to find! So they were still alive!
attributes.name: Timid Villager

attributes.content: The headman sent you after us?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: That combat ability... No wonder Mirai left Rhodes Island's contact information. She did say you weren't your average pharmacists.
attributes.name: Impatient Villager

attributes.content: The headman said the cave-in might not have trapped you, so he told us to go look for you in the mountains.
attributes.name: Impatient Villager

attributes.content: And if we found you, to take you far, far away from the village.
attributes.name: Impatient Villager

attributes.content: Why would he do that?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Ah, save it for later! The beasts are headed this way!
attributes.name: Timid Villager

attributes.content: Their numbers have increased as well. If this keeps up...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Curses, this is my fault for letting Kashiwau go alone. Even though the Palico followed him, given the current situation...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Can you two get to a safe place by yourselves?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: From here? Should be able to.
attributes.name: Impatient Villager

attributes.content: Sorry, I can't continue to escort you. Stay safe, and if you manage to return to the village, please tell the residents to evacuate as soon as possible!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Got it, and... thank you.
attributes.name: Impatient Villager

attributes.content: Artisan, we should go help Kashiwau.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Um, what about Noir Corne?
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: ...Right, they should still be with the Rathalos. I should update him on the plan, but... there's no time for that now.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: *doot**doot*—*doot**doot*—
attributes.name: Communicator

attributes.content: Comms! Alive!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: It's Corne. I'm glad we caught the signal.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yato, can you hear me?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I'm here. I'm seeing a smoke signal from my location, is that yours?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yeah, I'm with the Felyne Scholar and we're safe for the time being, how are things on your end?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I'm... doing fine.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Corne, do you know what the situation is like outside?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The beginnings of a Catastrophe, yeah?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Yes, there have been some obvious tells. Judging from the situation, there's still time to evacuate the villagers, but the wild beasts in the forest have already started rampaging.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: We need to update each other on the situation to coordinate our actions.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Not long ago... I made the mistake of clashing with Kashiwau and letting him go off on his own.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: He might be in some kind of danger right now, and I think... I should prioritize saving him over rendezvousing with you.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'm still not clear how we'll deal with the Rathalos, but it is highly likely that he'll lose his life on his own.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: It was my fault, so I absolutely cannot leave him behind.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I get you, but I gotta tell you something too.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: ...What is it?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Right now, we're above the Rathalos's nest, and we found out it's connected to the cave in the village...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: It's an Originium mine. That's the source of the dust that the Rathalos has been spreading.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: So that's what it was...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Also... we have a really good plan to deal with the Rathalos.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: If we destroy the mine and bury it in the rubble, we'll be able to take care of it once and for all. It won't be able to spread any more Oripathy, and the villagers can evacuate without any worries too.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Can you confirm the feasibility of this plan?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: It was hatched by someone who's researched the mine in depth. But if we want to do this right away, just me and the Felyne Scholar won't be enough. We'll need your help too.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: If we miss this opportunity, who knows what kind of accident might happen? In the worst case scenario, we'll probably be facing an unprecedented crisis, so we need you to make the call.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: ...Understood.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yato...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: What a dilemma we've gotten ourselves into...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yato, listen to me.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Remember what we decided back then? We've already made our choice.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Nonsense... I never said I couldn't do it.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'm not changing my decision. I'll go look for Kashiwau right away, while you do your best to keep the situation over there under control.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I will save his life, and I won't let the Rathalos harm anyone else either.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'll save everyone.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Alright, be careful out there.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: You too.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Die! All of you, die!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Get out of my sight!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You scamp... just why did you...?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Don't hold me back, old timer.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: You truly don't have a brain up there, do you?!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: A group of hunters... who know not the rules of the forest, much less respect them. And in provoking its wrath, sent all the beasts into a frenzy, trampling all over our crops.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Well, fantastic! I suppose they'll get their just deserts!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: All they brought were some mining tools. There's no way they can handle that many wild beasts.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: So I... I have to go in there, I can't just stand back and watch them get torn apart.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Aren't you also against the Originium mining project? This is perfect for us, is it not?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Those fools in the forest were asking for it! Just let nature consume them, as it should!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Old timer, as a hunter of the village, I of all people can't sit back at a time like this.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: You idiotic, wretched, brat!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You step outside this room, and I'll break both your legs!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: But you never did stop me from going.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Which is how I ended up like that.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Yes, yes, it was all me.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I caused your death... It's all my fault, I'm a terrible father.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You should feel ashamed of your incompetence.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: And you must also pay for your sins.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Yes, I should, which is why I've been trying to kill all the beasts here in your stead.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Especially that most wicked, enormous, insane fire-spewing monster!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: ...But I am incapable of hunting it.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: These hands of mine are too old to properly wield a spear, and mine eyes so clouded I can only watch milkbeasts frolic around.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Then lay down and die.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Die. Yes, that's about the only thing I am capable of now.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Kill one, and then another.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: And then... I will be able to see you again.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: He wanted to swing his hunting spear.
But his arms had no more strength, letting it fall to the ground.
He had no desire to retrieve it, for it had lost all purpose.
The beast bared its fangs, and was about to tear its prey apart.
Hah, denied the chance... A beast clad in scales... Now that's a sight I've not seen in...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: And now, the beasts mutually rend each other apart.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Will I die beneath the claws and teeth of these monsters...?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Yato, your meowjesty, I advise mew to reconsider, for it will not be easy to get out of this.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: What is that...? Someone's voice?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Just tell me how you can help me, or I'll just cut my way through.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Someone's speaking... am I just imagining things?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: It's not time for you to die yet, old man.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: What are you still doing here, girl?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Saving you.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You should have left this place, not come to my aid!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Fuzakeru na!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Didn't you say you were going to hunt the Rathalos? Yet you're so willing to die to some nameless beast?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Open your eyes already! The frenzied beasts are going to rush down the mountain sooner or later, and the first thing they'll trample over will be the village... Your neighbors will be forced to scatter and flee, and innocent children will die.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Are you going to just stand by and watch all of that happen?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yoshitaka Kashiwau, you are a hunter of Roka Village. And as its only hunter, you of all people can't sit back at a time like this.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The last thing you should be doing is feeling sorry for yourself here, much less giving up your life so easily.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Wield that spear in your hands, abandon those useless obsessions, and think carefully on what a hunter's duty is!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: To defend their home from the sharp claws of beasts, to desperately keep the flame of survival lit!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: True, somebody will always be forced to bear the price... Hunters, as well as us... But we have both chosen this path.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Now get up!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Akira...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: What was it that you said back then, to get me to let you go...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I said... that I would defeat them all.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Did you succeed?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I did, father.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Akira...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You've got a damn good spear, boy. I should hold onto it tight.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Go, and never appear before me again.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I will defeat them all.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: That's enough... noise from you.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You don't speak much, girl. But when you do, you're fiercer than a mangler.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: If you have the strength to talk, then stop wasting time and cover the rear.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I have no reason to take orders from a whippersnapper... Mind your own business.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Your meowjesty's words remind me so much of my time in Kokoto Village.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Before the age of the Hunters, it was the headman who first stepped up to defend the village from meownsters, earning the title of 'hero' for his bravery...
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Mrow! Please do not pick me up by the scruff of the neck.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Palico, watch our right.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Do you remember the moves I spoke of earlier, your meowjesty?
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Well, I've gone over them in my head a few times.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Mew must remember, the trick to using the Dual Blades to their fullest potential is to abandon all defense and enter a state alike to a ferocious beast.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Or as we call it, 'Demon Mode.'
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: 'Demon Mode,' huh...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: We move.
attributes.name: Yato
